title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync & async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embedder and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models; runs entirely in browser with local API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact providing sync & async APIs.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for interacting with Ollama; strongly-typed async client.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama server with GPU & CPU variants.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client for Ollama written in Go; supports conversation history.

title: ollama-gptscript
summary: GPTScript engine backend that lets you call Ollama models as tools in natural-language scripts.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: AUTOMATIC1111 Stable-Diffusion-WebUI extension that uses Ollama for prompt generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in chat threads.
